newsitem.title: DENMARK: FORECAST - Danish 97 public surplus 7.0 bln Dkk seen.
newsitem.headline: FORECAST - Danish 97 public surplus 7.0 bln Dkk seen.

text.p: The Danish Economy Ministry said on Tuesday in its latest report that it expected a 1997 public sector budget surplus of 7.0 billion crowns, rising to 8.0 billion crowns in 1998.
In its previous report last December, the ministry forecast a public sector budget surplus of 2.0 billion crowns in 1997, rising to 4.8 billion crowns in 1998.
